mapper.sql: t1.id,t1.goods_code as goodsCode,t1.goods_name as goodsName,t1.category_id as categoryId, t1.goods_image as goodsImage,t1.base_bar as baseBar,t1.base_unit as baseUnit,t1.stock_limit as stockLimit, t1.goods_des as goodsDes,t1.goods_images as goodsImages,t1.other_image as otherImage
mapper.select: select , , from t_whs_goods t1 left join t_whs_goods_unit t2 on t1.base_unit = t2.unit_code left join t_whs_goods_category t3 on t1.category_id = t3.id where t1.id = #{0}
mapper.delete:
delete from t_whs_goods where id in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select , , from t_whs_goods t1 left join t_whs_goods_unit t2 on t1.base_unit = t2.unit_code left join t_whs_goods_category t3 on t1.category_id = t3.id
and t1.goods_code=#{goodsCode} and t1.goods_name like CONCAT('%',#{goodsName},'%') and t1.category_id = #{categoryId}

select g.id,g.goods_name,s.price, (select MAX(r.price) from t_whs_goods_price_region r where r.goods_standard_id=s.id ) maxPrice, (select MIN(r.price) from t_whs_goods_price_region r where r.goods_standard_id=s.id ) minPrice, u.unit_name,s.standard,g.stock_limit,g.goods_image,g.goods_des,g.goods_images,g.other_image, s.id goodsStandardId from t_whs_goods g left join t_whs_goods_standard s on g.id=s.goods_id left join t_whs_goods_unit u on u.unit_code=s.unit_code where g.id=#{id}

SELECT s.id as standardId,s.price,g.id,g.goods_name, (select MAX(r.price) from t_whs_goods_price_region r where r.goods_standard_id=s.id ) maxPrice, (select MIN(r.price) from t_whs_goods_price_region r where r.goods_standard_id=s.id ) minPrice, u.unit_name,s.standard,g.stock_limit,g.goods_image,g.goods_des,g.goods_images,g.other_image FROM t_whs_goods_standard s LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods g ON s.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods_unit u ON u.unit_code = s.unit_code WHERE s.id = #{0}

select g.id,g.goods_name,s.price,(select MAX(price) FROM t_whs_goods_price_region r where r.goods_standard_id=s.id) maxPrice, (select MIN(price) from t_whs_goods_price_region r where r.goods_standard_id=s.id) minPrice,u.unit_name, (select count(*) from t_whs_order_goods og where og.goods_standard_id=s.id) saleCount,s.standard,g.goods_image,s.id as standardId from t_whs_goods_standard s LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods g on g.id=s.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods_unit u on u.unit_code=s.unit_code where s.id in(SELECT DISTINCT t.goods_standard_id FROM t_whs_order_goods t where t.user_id=#{0}) LIMIT 10

select , , from t_whs_goods t1 left join t_whs_goods_unit t2 on t1.base_unit = t2.unit_code left join t_whs_goods_category t3 on t1.category_id = t3.id where t1.category_id in
#{item}
select , , from t_whs_goods t1 left join t_whs_goods_unit t2 on t1.base_unit = t2.unit_code left join t_whs_goods_category t3 on t1.category_id = t3.id where t1.category_id = #{0}

select ,t2.id as standardId,t2.weight,t2.standard,t2.price,t3.unit_name as baseUnitName, t4.unit_name as goodsUnit from t_whs_goods_standard t2 left join t_whs_goods t1 on t2.goods_id = t1.id left join t_whs_goods_unit t3 on t1.base_unit = t3.unit_code left join t_whs_goods_unit t4 on t2.unit_code = t4.unit_code where t2.vaild='yes' AND t1.category_id = #{0}

select ,t2.id as standardId,t2.weight,t2.standard,t2.price,t3.unit_name as baseUnitName, t4.unit_name as goodsUnit,gk.id as keywordId from t_whs_goods_keywords gk left join t_whs_goods_standard t2 on t2.id = gk.mapping_id left join t_whs_goods t1 on t1.id = t2.goods_id left join t_whs_goods_unit t3 on t1.base_unit = t3.unit_code left join t_whs_goods_unit t4 on t2.unit_code = t4.unit_code
gk.keyword like concat('%',#{0},'%')
and gk.kw_type = 'goods' and t2.vaild = 'yes'

SELECT t3.id,t3.goods_code as goodsCode,t3.goods_name as goodsName,t3.category_id as categoryId, t3.goods_image as goodsImage,t3.base_bar as baseBar,t3.base_unit as baseUnit,t3.stock_limit as stockLimit, t3.goods_des as goodsDes,t3.goods_images as goodsImages,t3.other_image as otherImage, t2.weight,t2.standard,t2.price,t4.unit_name as baseUnitName,t2.id as standardId, t5.unit_name as goodsUnit FROM t_whs_plate_goods t1 LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods_standard t2 ON t1.goods_standard_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods t3 ON t2.goods_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods_unit t4 ON t2.unit_code = t4.unit_code LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods_unit t5 ON t3.base_unit = t5.unit_code where t2.vaild='yes' and t1.plate_id = #{0}
